issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw:
Yesterday we tried it 11 times during the finals. The robot fell 11 times. 
We also tested locally and also happened to us 100%.

Even if there's a 10% chance that the robot will not fall, it is not fair that we have to keep burning ourselves trying over and over and over until we get lucky.
Again, yesterday we spent 16 hours trying this on two final rounds, with no success. We have logs of all of them which we'll upload when the competition is over. But we need some official statement here.

Please @scpeters @chapulina take a look at this and reopen the issue. We can send you the logs privately or get them from our final runs S3 instance.
